front.title: IEEE Standard for Metal-Oxide Surge Arresters for AC Power Circuits

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Metal-oxide surge arresters designed to repeatedly limit the voltage surges on 48 Hz to 62 Hz power circuits by passing surge discharge current and automatically limiting the flow of system power current are discussed. This standard applies to devices for separate mounting and to those supplied integrally with other equipment.
